title: Adam and Eve
provenance: From the Collection of Leo Wallerstein
description: Adam stands at left, Eve, right, with tree between.  Eve holds the apple, receiving it from the serpent.  Adam holds a branch of the tree in his right hand, bearing a parrot and tablet inscribed: "ALBERTVS DURER NORICVS FACIEBAT", followed by the artist's monogram and date.
name: Print
